global.waveforms_buffer_max_size_note1: This value is in number of waveforms in the buffer
global.waveforms_buffer_max_size_note2: It is not a strict threshold, if more are available in the readout they are not discarded.
global.waveforms_buffer_max_size_note3: If too big, the following analysis steps might slow down

global.waveforms_buffer_max_size_note5: Waveform minimum dimension: 14 B (header) + 2 B * samples_number
